values.description: Base URL for the Learning Assessment API. Change this to match your server configuration.
Email/username for the admin account. This account must exist in your database.
Password for the admin account. Update this to match your admin credentials.
Auto-generated unique timestamp for this test run. Do not set manually.
JWT token for regular user authentication. Auto-generated during login.
JWT token for admin authentication. Auto-generated during admin login.
ID of the created test user. Auto-captured for cleanup purposes.
Email of the created test user. Auto-generated with timestamp.
Username of the created test user. Auto-generated with timestamp.
Password of the created test user. Auto-generated.
Filename of uploaded profile picture. Auto-captured for cleanup.
ID of the first available pola test. Auto-captured from test listing.
ID of the first available gaya test. Auto-captured from test listing.
ID of the first pola question. Auto-captured for test submission.
ID of the first pola choice. Auto-captured for test submission.
ID of the first gaya question. Auto-captured for test submission.
ID of the first gaya choice. Auto-captured for test submission.
ID of submitted pola test result. Auto-captured for cleanup.
ID of submitted gaya test result. Auto-captured for cleanup.
ID of created MOTD entry. Auto-captured for cleanup.
ID of created insight. Auto-captured for cleanup.
ID of created pola question. Auto-captured for cleanup.
ID of created pola choice. Auto-captured for cleanup.
ID of created gaya question. Auto-captured for cleanup.
ID of created gaya choice. Auto-captured for cleanup.
